name: Greta
description:
These lovable handmade dolls are each completely unique. They feature hand-embroidered faces, long, skinny limbs, felt hair and an assortment of cheery fabrics. Many of Meg+Andy products incorporate  up-cycled fabrics along with beautiful designer prints which make each doll one of a kind.

Greta has greenish eyes, reddish brown wool-blend felt hair, a pink and red polka dot body and a blue print skirt. She also has a removable flower pin to accessorize her dress or hair and green knit legs. She stands about 22 inches tall. You get to choose the color of flower pin!

name: Jess
description:
These lovable handmade dolls are each completely unique. They feature hand-embroidered faces, long, skinny limbs, felt hair and an assortment of cheery fabrics. Many of Meg+Andy products incorporate re-used or recycled fabrics along with beautiful designer prints which make each doll one of a kind.

Jess has black child-safe plastic eyes, dark brown felt hair, a green Amy Butler polka dot body, and a fun gray checked skirt with red pom-poms. She also has an attached button pin on her dress. She stands about 22 inches.

name: Evelyn
description:
These lovable handmade dolls are each completely unique. They feature hand-embroidered faces, long, skinny limbs, felt hair and an assortment of cheery fabrics. Many of Meg+Andy products incorporate re-used or recycled fabrics along with beautiful designer prints which make each doll one of a kind.

Evelyn has brown eyes, green wool-blend felt hair, a chambray body and a fun yellow skirt with red pom-poms. She also has a removable purple flower pin to accessorize her dress or hair and seer-sucker legs. She stands about 22 inches tall.

name: Large Doll- "Jane"
description:
These lovable handmade dolls are each completely unique. They feature hand-embroidered faces, long, skinny limbs, felt hair and an assortment of cheery fabrics. Many of Meg+Andy products incorporate re-used or recycled fabrics along with beautiful designer prints which make each doll one of a kind.

Jane has green eyes, yellow wool-blend felt hair, a black and white checked body with a fun "alexander henry" print skirt. She also has a removable red flower pin to accessorize her dress or hair. She is a little taller than the other large dolls and stands about 22 inches.

name: Large Doll- "Olivia"
description:
These lovable handmade dolls are each completely unique. They feature hand-embroidered faces, long, skinny limbs, felt hair and an assortment of cheery fabrics. Many of Meg+Andy products incorporate re-used or recycled fabrics along with beautiful designer prints which make each doll one of a kind.

Olivia has green eyes, a red polka- dot body with a removable "heather bailey" print skirt and turquoise knit legs. She stands about 18 inches tall.

options.name: This doll is available for special order. Will take 2 weeks to ship
